price: Loš su primjer ljudi koji su Naše dokaze smatrali lažnim; oni su nepravdu sami sebi činili.
arabic: سَآءَ مَثَلًا ٱلۡقَوۡمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَأَنفُسَهُمۡ كَانُواْ يَظۡلِمُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: sāa mathalan al-qawmu alladhīna kadhabū biāyātinā wa-anfusahum kānū yaẓlimūna
